title: Can I have my Rp back?
body: Bought some rp to play with friends in nemesis for skin boosts. Played a game used it, and enemy team remade. I'd kinda like my RP back.

replies.body: The system might not be picking up a remake after a skin boost is used.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can look into this for you.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as we can!
Ah you at least got rp,once i bought rp with mobile phone and never got rp xD I didnt bought rp since then

Are you still experiencing this issue?  If you still haven't received your RP and the transaction went through, reach out to our tech team by submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll reply to you asap!
